biocontainers.name: lucy
biocontainers.summary: A program for dna sequence quality trimming and vector removal. its purpose is to process dna sequence data acquired from dna sequencers to prepare the data for downstream processing applications such as genome assembly.

biotools.summary: A program for DNA sequence quality trimming and vector removal. Its purpose is to process DNA sequence data acquired from DNA sequencers to prepare the data for downstream processing applications such as genome assembly.

bioschemas.name: Lucy
bioschemas.summary: A program for DNA sequence quality trimming and vector removal. Its purpose is to process DNA sequence data acquired from DNA sequencers to prepare the data for downstream processing applications such as genome assembly.
